since basic jet is an air-brething crap now, and turbojet uses way many fuel (also the afterburner looks stupid on some planes), what about more jet engines? like a turbofan for cargo planes, or heavy stuff and an engine with advanced thrust vectoring? maybe even scramjets, so what do you think? ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

sorry for my english ;-;
2.5m Turbofans is a good Idea... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Love to see scramjets. Perhaps even props for transport throughout Kerbin. 

Also what id like to see along with new engines is more stuff to do around Kerbin like pick up passengers from one area and transport them to the KSC where they can be recruited ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
maybe mk3 and mk2 cargo ramps to deploy rovers/science stuff on certain locations too
0.625m jet engines would be nice too.

I'd rather have an electric propeller added, to be honest.

Basic jet engine is not that bad.

I'd support the 2,5m "turbofan", having a massive bypass ratio for slow cargo haulers.

It wouldn't be a lot of use on high altitudes (>20km) or at mach numbers over .9, but it would have a fair amount of thrust at ground level.

Also, what I'd \*really\* like to see is a jet engine that is just a compressed gas generator and you can place nozzles or exhaust somewhere else, with "magic duct" carrying the exhaust.

Those exhausts could be opened and closed according to action groups. Which would be a great addition for VTOL hovering.

Such an engine would have an enormous amount of power on the ground, but it would fall off rapidly at speed or altitude depending on your intake/exhaust configuration.

What we want: 2m Basic Jet Engine, 2mRAPIER, 2mTurbojet/ramjet, Normal big-s canards, and structural wings, normal big-s delta wings, and sharp wings. I would also like my [previously suggested](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127811-New-scramjet-engine-and-easy-to-fly-RAPIER-Now-with-mod!!?p=2060812#post2060812) scramjet&rocket-like RAPIER. You can check out [my mod of them](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/hj71ydj52ge1og8/AABKtbyteSz2CtiiiXOHHlema?dl=0), and [the craft I balanced them for.](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/pp60k4eyhau2byo/AACjualS63vjsRIiDK4DiXAta?dl=0) Also, some propellers would be nice. They could be linked to Basic jets, ant from further on, the basic jet will no longer produce thrust, but it will make the propeller spin. Custom Turboprops!! Also, a lot less efficient (but free) electric motor, that could consume electricity, and power a propeller.

Lots of good ideas. I think what I'd like as a "minimum":

2.5m diameter airliner turbofan. With matching intake unless it's a one-piece engine+intake.

Electric propeller. Not too fussed about the details, *any* electric prop would be a great addition to the stock game especially now we can't do ion gliders any more.

Jet RCS nozzles, using liquid fuel and intake air. Basically this would emulate the bleed air jets used on VTOLs like the Harrier.

> 
> Jet RCS nozzles, using liquid fuel and intake air. Basically this would emulate the bleed air jets used on VTOLs like the Harrier.

I'm already working on that as a mod. Either through a simple ModuleManager plugin that makes the stock engines produce additional bleed air (and have the RCS blocks consume them when appropriate), or a complete "Advanced Turbine Pack" which has separate gas generator and nozzle parts you can put wherever you want.

The spool time on the default jet engines is just too slow to be of any use for VTOL, through something like Throttle Controlled Avionics.
